title: Morgana Blackshield Bug
body:
When playing the One for All mode I encountered what appeared to be a bug interaction between silences and Morgana's blackshield ability.

The circumstances were as follows:
Blitzcrank used his ultimate, silencing the Morgana.
One of the other Morgana's placed a Blackshield on the first target.

While the Blackshield was active, Blitzcrank used Rocket Grab, which was not cancelled by Blackshield, and the Morgana was pulled.
The graphic for Blackshield remained on the Morgana even after the Rocket Grab, and a second Rocket Grab from a different Blitzcrank also succesfully pulled the Morgana, despite Blackshield.

I am guessing that this interaction is because of the silence, as in if the target is silenced, Blackshield does not cancel the incoming crowd control ability.

replies.body: Having not seen it myself, could be a bunch of things, even just a visual bug in which the shield had been broken but the VFX still showed. Did you happen to notice if she had the purple health on her bar? Cause if that wasn't there, would indicate simply a visual bug, otherwise could indeed be some interaction with the silence. Knowing some of the random bugs that pop up in this game could be just about anything causing it. Could be cause it's the same champ so it thinks the shield can't be cast even though it has been, but I feel like that makes a bit too much sense for spaghetti code. I don't know squat about coding and all that so I'm just guessing here.

i must admit i did not pay attention to whether the purple health was there.

however it should be relatively easy to test in custom games, get a blitz on one side morgana and one other on the other side, get blitz to silence. react with blackshield after the silence then have blitz use rocket grab

will clearly show how the interaction plays out

true enough, but it could be a bug related to one for all, in that it may have been the morg was shielded by a diff morg WHILE she was silenced which caused the strange interaction, rather than simply a black shield following the silence. In which case it isn't something that would come up in norms/ranked at all and wouldn't have been discovered till now.
